security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a payroll authorization form for Helen Whitney Watriss, an Assistant Editor for the HSCA, detailing her appointment and salary as of November 3, 1978, with redactions for her social security number.
summary_one_paragraph: A payroll authorization form from the U.S. House of Representatives documents the appointment of Helen Whitney Watriss as an Assistant Editor for the HSCA, effective November 3, 1978, with an annual salary of $27,000.00; it includes a certification that her employment does not violate regulations against employing relatives of current Members of Congress, and confirms her non-relationship to any current member; her social security number is redacted due to privacy concerns, as noted by the Assassination Records Review Board.
title: Payroll Authorization Form
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
